q: was voted comeback player of the year. DALLAS- The NFL threw Michael Vick a party Saturday night as the Eagles quarterback was named comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. I thank my coaches and my teammates, said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award.`` They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents.'' notes, Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell said that Bush Administration officials are`` admirers'' of Ben Ali and Donald Rumsfeld of Defense Donald Rumsfeld said the country provided'' constructive leadership in the world'': It is worth rewinding and noting some choice words that former US secretary of state Colin Powell had to say about the country when he visited in December 2003. `` Our bilateral relationship is very, very strong,'' said Colin Powell .`` We are great admirers of Tunisia and the progress that has been achieved under president Ben Ali's leadership.''[...]

Cairo had raised fears that the country could suffer the same loss of cultural heritage as occurred in Iraq in 2003 after the fall of Saddam Hussein . Egypt's cultural treasures are now secure, Zahi Hawass said. The Valley of the Kings is safe, the pyramids are safe, 24 museums are safe, the synagogues and the monasteries and the Muslim monuments are completely safe, he said. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento.
